comments.body: If this is a standalone hypervisor, shouldn't the username be `root`? administrator@vsphere.local is not available on a standalone hypervisor

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +67,71 @@  vmware_guest_facts:
    hostname: 192.168.1.209
    username: administrator@vsphere.local
    password: vmware
    datacenter: ha-datacenter
